description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science and a career spanning various high-impact roles, Yeehaa brings a unique blend of creativity and analytical skills to any team. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for creating impactful solutions. Authored 'Across Space And Time' on ecosystem architecture, emphasizing multidisciplinary approaches for thriving environments.
blurb: Ecosystem now describes various forms of organizations beyond natural environments, reflecting a shift in understanding human organizations as living systems transcending time and space requiring design for development.
